Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Citropin 1.2 (natural AMPs; XXA, UCLL1c; frog, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: Australian blue mountains tree frog,Litoria citropa

Literature Information.Literature: Active against L. lactis (MIC 3 ug/ml), M. luteus, S. uberis (MIC 12 ug/ml), B. cereus, S. epidermidis and S. aureus (MIC 25 ug/ml). CW 4/2019; 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Wegener KL., Wabnitz PA., Carver JA., Bowie JH., Chia BCS., Wallace JC., Tyler MJ.1999, Australia
Literature Information.Title: Host defence peptides from the skin glands of the Australian blue mountains tree-frog Litoria citropa. Solution structure of the antibacterial peptide citropin 1.1.
